title: 如果有個小學生想同同學扑嘢

replies.msg: 咁係咪戀童癖？

The ICD-10 defines pedophilia as "a sexual preference for children, boys or girls or both, usually of prepubertal or early pubertal age".[70] Like the DSM, this system's criteria require that the person be at least 16 years of age or older before being diagnosed as a pedophile. The person must also have a persistent or predominant sexual preference for prepubescent children at least five years younger than them.
喺唔傷害到人嘅情況下,你情我願做乜都得
只要你細過9歲，就無刑事責任。
